title: School holidays from today (6); New school term from 18th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Education announced that the 3rd school term 2021 for Government schools and Government approved private schools will end on Wednesday (6).
The Secretary to the Ministry of Education said the 2022 school year begins on the 18th of April 2022.
President must go for us to consider any proposal – Anura Kumara
